name: Cooking Games - Cooking food For Free 2017
name_original: Cooking Games - Cooking food For Free 2017
description:
Are you ready to prepare all type of cuisine all over the world? If you always wanted to be a chef and cook for all your friends and family, this is the game you were waiting for.
Try to keep up with all the order of your hungry costumers. Hurry up preparing all the food and don’t let them wait to much or they will leave your restaurant and you will gain bad reputation all over your town.
Some of your costumers have more patience than others, some want to eat right away they arrived, others like to chill out and think what they want for eating. Don’t let your guard down, you need to think as a professional chef.
Be aware because near your kitchen there are schools and offices where all of a sudden you think you have everything under control and the next moment you have a huge line of costumers asking for burgers, hotdogs, pizza, drinks,soups and all you can imagine.

How to Play
Step up and cook as a master is something you will need to do. It is very easy if you have fast fingers and an intelligent brain that know what comes first when making a hamburger (bread, tomato, bread, onion, steak, ketchup, banana ) “I think that is not the way it should be... right?

Hamm, it is hardener of what I’ve thought, you don’t worry you are smarter than me.
Lookat every client to know his order and start preparing it as soon as possible. There is timing, so speed up and cook fast or they will complain. Put together all the order and give it, here you need no waitress.

What to Cook
There are a lot of food variety from Chinese to Italian and American, so you will learn how to correctly prepare: incredible and crunchy pizza, delicious spaghetti, super burgers, “perrito caliente” hotdogs, hot seafood soups, a full breakfast English style, California roll Japanese sushi, or a super spicy Mexican taco or burrito, and if the costumer is still willing to eat a bit more you have a section of sweet deserts to finish your amazing dinner. The chocolate chips cookie with a hot cup of cafe is what they prefer to finish the day and go to sleep.
As you can see this cooking game has no limits.
What are you waiting for to feed up all these hungry people, Download our game now!!

Main Game Features
● Realistic Food Icons & Graphics
● A Lot of Cosine& Preparations.
● Challenges for You & Your Friends.
● More Than 15 Types of Cooking
● Different Waiting Times for Each Costumer
● Incredible Music
● Upgrade Your restaurant or Decorate It
● Easy Game-Play Special for Kids
